Cheng 2D network¶

sota_implementations.cheng_2017.cheng_network.asymmetric_network(image_shape, numInitChannels=16, fixed_dropout=0.0, t_downsmp_layer=4)[source]¶

Create the assymetric network proposed in Cheng et al.

Parameters

  • image_shape (array of 3 int) – Dimensions of the input image.

  • numInitChannels (int, optional) – Number of convolution channels to start with. In each downsampling/upsampling the number of filters are multiplied/divided by 2.

  • fixed_dropout (float, optional) – Dropout value to be fixed. If no value is provided the default behaviour will be to select a piramidal value stating from 0.1 and reaching 0.3 value.

  • t_downsmp_layer (int, optional) – Degree of randomness in the sampling pattern which corresponds to the t value defined in the paper for the proposed stochastic downsampling layer.

Returns

model – Asymmetric network proposed in Cheng et al. model.

Return type

Keras model

Here is a picture of the network extracted from the original paper:

sota_implementations.cheng_2017.cheng_network.pad_depth(x, desired_channels)[source]¶

Zero padding to use in case the feature map changes in shortcut connections.

sota_implementations.cheng_2017.cheng_network.encode_block(inp_layer, channels, t_downsmp_layer=4, downsample=False, fixed_dropout=0.1)[source]¶

Encode block defined in Cheng et al.

Parameters

  • inp_layer (Keras layer) – Input layer.

  • channels (int, optional) – Feature maps to define in Conv layers.

  • t_downsmp_layer (int, optional) – t value defined in the paper for the proposed stochastic downsampling layer.

  • downsample (bool, optional) – To make a downsampling. Blue blocks in the encoding part.

  • fixed_dropout (float, optional) – Dropout value.

Returns

out – Last layer of the block.

Return type

Keras layer

sota_implementations.cheng_2017.cheng_network.decode_block(inp_layer, channels, upsample=False)[source]¶

Encode block defined in Cheng et al.

Parameters

  • inp_layer (Keras layer) – Input layer.

  • channels (int, optional) – Feature maps to define in Conv layers.

  • upsample (bool, optional) – To make an upsampling. Blue blocks in the decoding part.

Returns

out – Last layer of the block.

Return type

Keras layer
